Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: CoreNetworkId
properties.description: The Id of the core network that you want to peer a transit gateway to.

type.description: The Id of the core network that you want to peer a transit gateway to.

properties.name: TransitGatewayArn
properties.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the transit gateway that you will peer to a core network

type.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the transit gateway that you will peer to a core network

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

properties.name: CoreNetworkArn
properties.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the core network that you want to peer a transit gateway to.

type.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the core network that you want to peer a transit gateway to.

properties.name: PeeringId
properties.description: The Id of the transit gateway peering

type.description: The Id of the transit gateway peering

properties.name: State
properties.description: The state of the transit gateway peering

type.description: The state of the transit gateway peering

properties.name: EdgeLocation
properties.description: The location of the transit gateway peering

type.description: The location of the transit gateway peering

properties.name: ResourceArn
properties.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the resource that you will peer to a core network

type.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the resource that you will peer to a core network

properties.name: CreatedAt
properties.description: The creation time of the transit gateway peering

type.description: The creation time of the transit gateway peering
